H0.text: A seed planted from a tree helps to renew the tree resource.

H1.text: An offshore rig pumps oil is an event that helps to renew a resource.

H2.text: Filling a car with gasoline helps to renew a resource.

H3.text: An office being heated with coal is an event that helps to renew a resource.

A4.text: Seed germination is a process by which a seed embryo develops into a seedling.
